mapper.update: update scenic set scenic_type = #{scenicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_name = #{scenicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_img_path = #{scenicImgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_content = #{scenicContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_address = #{scenicAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select scenic_id, scenic_type, `rank`, scenic_name, scenic_img_path, scenic_content, price, open_time, scenic_address, creat_time from scenic where scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
